name: Mickey Mouse: Friends of the Guards
name_original: Mickey Mouse: Friends of the Guards
description:
The most lysergic Doped Games production ever in free download !!! Help Mickey Mouse infame the inhabitants of the colorful city! Enforce the DPCM and join the graces of Basettoni! Thanks to the innovative gameplay and its replayability, fun is guaranteed. Go in search of Goofy in the new DLC! A renewed graphic design and other crazy surprises await you and all for FREE !!!

This game is aimed at an adult and mature audience.
NOT RECOMMENDED FOR MINORS UNDER 18 YEARS
